finesse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if you do something with finesse, you do it with a lot of skill and style
finesse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Dario played the sonata with great finesse.
finesse.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to handle a situation well, but in a way that is slightly deceitful
finesse.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to do something with a lot of skill and style
